com.technology.jep.jepria.client.widget.field.wysiwyg

Class RichTextEditorField

  • java.lang.Object
    • Grid
      • com.technology.jep.jepria.client.widget.field.wysiwyg.RichTextEditorField

  • public class RichTextEditorField
extends Grid
    This widget will create a WYSIWYG-editor.
